node.title: Tyson Fury '50 per cent fit' for fight with Deontay Wilder
node.alt: Tyson Fury grimaces as he punches Deontay Wilder in the head, with sweat spraying off Wilder's head
node.description: Tyson Fury wasÂ dealing with a serious injury during his heavyweight championship fight with Deontay Wilder and has since required surgery, his father John says.
node.content:
["Tyson Fury was\u00a0dealing with a serious injury during his heavyweight championship fight with Deontay Wilder and has since required surgery, his father John says.", "Fury knocked out Wilder in the 11th round of their gripping, see-sawing contest in Las Vegas to retain his WBC heavyweight title in October.", "However, John Fury told BT Sport that Tyson Fury could barely extend his arms due to bone spurs in his elbows.", "\"It wasn't a boxing match, was it?\u00a0Because Tyson was very badly injured going into that fight,\" he said.", "\"He\u00a0had to have chromosome (cortisone)\u00a0injections in both elbows.\u00a0Both elbows were numb.", "\"He's since had an operation, a six-hour, all-day [procedure] in the hospital having it sorted because I think he had some bone spurs we had to get removed.", "John Fury said Tyson Fury told him the pain was \"unbearable\" when he threw a jab, and he ended up fighting two people:\u00a0Wilder and the pain.", "", "
Tyson Fury knocked down Deontay Wilder three times in the contest.(Getty Images: Al Bello)
", "\"So he said the only thing was to get close and make a war of it,\" John Fury said.", "\"He [Tyson Fury]\u00a0said, 'I know I wanted to win more than him. Seek and destroy or be destroyed.\u00a0That was my motto,'\" he said.", "\"He could see there was ring rust.", "\"[He had been] 20 months out the ring, so he thought, 'To hell with boxing.\u00a0It's not going to work. I'm ring rusty.\u00a0Let's have it. Let's have a war.'", "\"And he stood toe to toe with him and it was a thrilling affair.", "\"But it shortens careers, doesn't it?\"", "
Tyson Fury only '50 per cent' fit
", "John Fury spoke at length about\u00a0his reservations about Tyson Fury taking the fight after enduring such a disrupted build-up.", "That included suffering COVID-19 in July and worrying about his daughter\u00a0Athena, who was rushed to Liverpool's Alder Hey Hospital after suffering serious complications after her birth.", "John Fury said Athena \"flatlined for three minutes\" at one stage and was on a ventilator.", "John Fury said his son was \"at his low point\" then, which was just a month out from the fight, and he was so unfit he could barely get through a 5 kilometre\u00a0run without his lungs \"burning\".", "\"To be honest, I think he only had three or four weeks to train for it,\" John Fury said.", "\"He was only 50 per cent of what he should be because he had too many problems.", "\"It was worrying for me, to be honest. I said, 'You're not physically ready for this.'\"", "\"To go from there, four weeks later and do what he did?\u00a0He's moving mountains this man.\"", "
'His eyes were twisted with ill intentions'
", "", "
John Fury said Tyson Fury's eyes were\u00a0\"twisted with ill intent\".(Getty Images: Ethan Miller)
", "John Fury said despite the disrupted build-up and the injury, Tyson Fury, who has an unbeaten professional record of 31-0-1, just wanted the victory\u00a0more.", "\"I've never seen a look like that in his eye \u2026 I've never seen him look like that before.", "\"I [thought], 'Hello, hell is coming to breakfast here.'", "\"The boxing side of it\u00a0went out of the window\u00a0because I knew he was going to be like that from the off.", "\"When I've seen him, the look in his eye, he just wanted to destroy \u2014\u00a0seek and destroy \u2014\u00a0and that's what he did.", "\"They got away with it [poor preparation] \u2026\u00a0[because] Tyson is that damn good. He's got this burning desire never to be defeated by another man.", "\"He's done the impossible.\"", "John Fury said\u00a0he urged his son to retire after the fight.", "\"I said, 'Retire, you've done enough.' He's won everything.\u00a0There's nothing left to prove.", "\"There's more to life than getting your brains rattled to please the public.\"", "However, he said it was likely Tyson Fury would continue to box until he was 40 and he could not go more than two months without wanting to get back in the gym.", "\"My son is who he is, number one on the planet. His name will be spoken about in folklore for hundreds of years.\""]
